issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Runtime
components.description: Generic bucket for uncategorized runtime issues

fields.description:
{{logger.warn}} is executed under certain circumstances in the CoverFlowImageType and BarItemType parsers, but is not included in the list of requires. {{require('path/to/logger')}} needs to be added to resolve this.

Q&A: http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/154475/alloy-how-to-internationalize-tabbedbar-labels
fields.summary: "logger" not defined in CoverFlowImageType and BarItemType parsers

comments.body:
PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/170
test app: https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/tree/master/test/apps/testing/ALOY-734

Functional test can be considered passed simply by running the app on iOS without compile time or runtime exception.

Verified as fixed.

Environment:
Titanium SDK 3.1.2.v20130710144553
Appcelerator Studio 3.1.2.201307101037
Alloy 1.2.0

Closing.
